name: Thor of Darkness
description:
Thor Is Defenseless.

You are Thor, and have woken up to an invasion on earth. But the aliens have altered reality. The world will glitch out sometimes, due to this. You have no weapons, and the aliens have got rid of your powers. You need to jump to various color keys in order to reach the next stage.  

Mechanics and Controls are in the game's help menu. The glitches and bugs you encounter are put there intentionally and have been placed randomly. These often occur after you die, so don't die. If they become too much, press S for a restart. 

Enjoy.

ONLY DOWNLOADABLE FOR WINDOWS
